channel.title: Problem with adding highscores
channel.description:
Hey, i followed the guide for adding highscores at http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html
and i get this error for my highscores
Warning: mysql_result(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\Upload\config.php on line 178 Table 'highscores.skillsoverall' doesn't exist

item.title: Problem with adding highscores
item.dc:creator: @Zezerex Zezerex
item.description:
@Zezerex wrote:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:2, topic:286382”]Erm?..
What error?
The ‘error’ linked us to the PHP tutorial for highscores.[/quote]oh sorry, i double copied

its

Warning: mysql_result(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\Upload\config.php on line 178
Table ‘highscores.skillsoverall’ doesn’t exist

Read full topic
